com.mongodb
Class ReplicaSetStatus

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.ConnectionStatus
      com.mongodb.ReplicaSetStatus

@ThreadSafe
public class ReplicaSetStatus
extends ConnectionStatus

Keeps replica set status. Maintains a background thread to ping all members of the set to keep the status current.

Method Detail

ensureMaster

ConnectionStatus.Node ensureMaster()
Description copied from class: ConnectionStatus
Ensures that we have the current master, if there is one. If the current snapshot of the replica set has no master, this method waits one cycle to find a new master, and returns it if found, or null if not.

Specified by:
ensureMaster in class ConnectionStatus
Returns:
address of the current master, or null if there is none

getMaxBsonObjectSize

public int getMaxBsonObjectSize()
Gets the maximum size for a BSON object supported by the current master server. Note that this value may change over time depending on which server is master.

Returns:
the maximum size, or 0 if not obtained from servers yet.
Throws:
MongoException
